question-list.question: You’re really busy at work and a colleague is telling you their life story and personal woes. You:

answerB.text: Think it’s more important to give them some of your time; work can wait

answerC.text: Listen, but with only with half an ear

answerD.text: Interrupt and explain that you are really busy at the moment

question-list.question: You’ve been sitting in the doctor’s waiting room for more than 25 minutes. You:

answerA.text: Look at your watch every two minutes

answerB.text: Bubble with inner anger, but keep quiet

answerC.text: Explain to other equally impatient people in the room that the doctor is always running late

answerD.text: Complain in a loud voice, while tapping your foot impatiently

question-list.question: You’re having an animated discussion with a colleague regarding a project that you’re in charge of. You:

answerB.text: Think that they are obviously right

answerC.text: Defend your own point of view, tooth and nail

question-list.question: You are taking part in a guided tour of a museum. You:

answerA.text: Are a bit too far towards the back so don’t really hear what the guide is saying

answerC.text: Make sure that everyone is able to hear properly

answerD.text: Are right up the front, adding your own comments in a loud voice
